page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: Every acre of land that could be used would be.Fertilisers were used in the hope of getting a better yield in grass and corn corps.Most farmers aimed to be self sufficient in their crop growing but some managed to sell corn and bought straw.Some milled their own corn but still needed to buy in balanced meal for dairy cows. There was one horticultural establishment with a retail outlet in the nearby town.This grew vegetables and produced local cider buying in the necessary raw material. Numerous farms allowed fields to be campsites on a short term basis in the height of the holiday season.Many had holiday cottages to let.
